Name: Ridiculousness
Title: Sterling and Carly Aquilino LXXVII
Desc: Heads together in head hammers; stepping outside for ice cold winter gymnastics; vomit fountains.
LongDescription: Rob Dyrdek, Steelo Brim, and Carly Aquilino put their heads together in head hammers; step outside for some ice cold winter gymnastics; throw it all up for vomit fountains.
